summary.title: I love creating!
summary.content: I love creating web applicatio,ns that are not only functional but also visually appealing. My passion drives me to keep working on my skills to produce the bests product for any given situation and I love figuring out the intrecacies of new technology to make not only my work but also the work of those around me easier and more efficient. Sharing my experience and benefitting from the experience of others is what I love most about working in a development team. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer.

summary.title: Hey!
summary.content: I'm René, a passionate Full-Stack Web Developer with a knack for creating dynamic and user-friendly web applications. My time as a freelancer as an audiodesigner gives me unique insights on how best to tailor to customers and my passion in development pushes me further on my journey to be the developer I want to be. My strengths lie particularly in TypeScript and React.js for the frontend as well as Express.js and .NET for backend solutions. I always enjoy to engage with the full breadth of web development and strive to understand not only one but all aspects of an application in its fullest.
